oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_academia_recruiter = {
    leader_class = commander
    has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
    has_base_skill >= 8
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
    has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
    has_ethic = ethic_materialist
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_adaptable = {
    leader_class = commander
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_adventurous_spirit = {
    leader_class = commander
    has_base_skill >= 4
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_aggressive = {
    leader_class = commander
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing = {
    leader_class = commander
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
    trait_is_wilderness_check = no
    has_global_flag = game_started
    exists = owner
    owner = { country_uses_food  =  yes  } 
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_archaeo_specialization = {
    leader_class = commander
    has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral
    has_base_skill >= 4
    has_ancrel = yes
    
    OR = {
        has_paragon_dlc = no
     has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral
    }
    exists = owner
    owner = { has_ascension_perk  =  ap_archaeoengineers  } 
}

     has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

     has_trait = subclass_commander_councilor

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_politician = {
    leader_class = commander
    
    OR = {
        is_gestalt = no
     AND = is_gestalt = yes
     is_councilor = yes
    }
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_robotist = {
    leader_class = commander
    has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
    has_base_skill >= 8
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
    
    OR = {
        has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
    }
    exists = owner
    owner = { OR  = { has_technology  =  tech_robotic_workers   has_cybernetic_ascension  = yes  is_individual_machine  = yes } } 
}

    has_base_skill >= 8
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_unyielding = {
    leader_class = commander
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_venerated = {
    leader_class = commander
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
    has_global_flag = game_started
    has_base_skill > 1
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_void_hunter = {
    leader_class = commander
    has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
    exists = owner
    owner = { has_encountered_any_fauna  = yes } 
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_warden = {
    leader_class = commander
    has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
    
    OR = {
        has_paragon_dlc = no
     has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
    }
}



oxr_mdlc_leader_commander_can_add_leader_trait_wrecker = {
    leader_class = commander
    has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral
    has_base_skill >= 4
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
    has_trait = subclass_commander_admiral
}
